H0.text: In which book of the Old Testament does the destruction of the walls of Jericho occur. Exodus

H1.text: In which book of the Old Testament does the destruction of the walls of Jericho occur. Numbers

H2.text: In which book of the Old Testament does the destruction of the walls of Jericho occur. Deuteronomy

H3.text: In which book of the Old Testament does the destruction of the walls of Jericho occur. يوشع

A4.text: The destruction of Jericho is described in the Book of Joshua (chapters 6).
